content.question: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed during the administration of this task that contain a list (or other collection type) being used in your program. The first program code segment must show how data has been stored in the list.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed during the administration of this task that contain a list (or other collection type) being used in your program. The first program code segment must show how data has been stored in the list.
The second program code segment must show the data in the same list being processed, such as creating new data from the existing data, as part of fulfilling the programâ€™s purpose.
Provide a written response that: (Approx. 75 words, exclusive of program code) identifies the name of the list being processed in this response, and
describes what the data contained in the list represents in your program.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
